content: a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain 6 140 double_crochet made measure square if your square measures 12 end off and weave in ends if your square measures 11 5 then work round 10 as follows round 10 slip_stitch to first corner space chain 1 * 3 single_crochet in chain 3 space single_crochet in next 35 double_crochet repeat from * three times more join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 152 single_crochet made melinda s wrap square 3 1 13 end off weave in ends many thanks to my testers marjos debspugs pandastamper tinochka7 and marifly feel free to make as many of these as you like for local craft fairs/auctions/raffles/bazaars but please do not sell finished items online if making for charity please let me know the name of the charity & inwrapude my contact info with the item anastaciaknits@gmail net / http //anastaciaknits net if you have any questions or comments or just want to join like-minded souls please join my ravelry group at http //www ravelry com/groups/anastacia-knits-designs thanks melinda s wrap square 3 1 13
